arranged.","events":{"Pregnant(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"The Pregnant event is fired when two cats successfully breed and the pregnancy  timer begins for the Set to  address(0) to clear all siring approvals for this Hauntoo.","_sireId":"A Hauntoo that you own that _addr will now be able to sire with."}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-balanceOf}."},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the Hauntoo acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)","_sireId":"The ID of the Hauntoo acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)"}},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the proposed matron.","_sireId":"The ID of the proposed sire."}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-getApproved}."},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"details":"Looks at a given Hauntoo and, if pregnant and if the gestation period has passed,  combines the genes of the two parents to create a new baby. The new Hauntoo is assigned  to the current owner of the matron. Upon successful completion, both the matron and the  new baby will be ready to breed again. Note that anyone can call this function (if they  are willing to pay the gas!), but the new baby always goes to the mother's owner.","params":{"_matronId":"A Hauntoo ready to give birth."},"returns":{"_0":"The Hauntoo ID of the new baby."}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-isApprovedForAll}."},"isPregnant(uint256)":{"details":"Checks whether a hauntoo is currently pregnant.","params":{"_hauntooId":"reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it"}},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"params":{"_hauntooId":"reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it"}},"name()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-name}."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-ownerOf}."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-safeTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC721-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC721-setApprovalForAll}."},"setAutoBirthFee(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the minimum payment required for calling giveBirthAuto(). Can only  be called by the COO address. (This fee is used to offset the gas cost incurred  by the autobirth daemon)."},"setGeneScienceAddress(address)":{"details":"Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.","params":{"_address":"An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"symbol()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-symbol}."},"tokenByIndex(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Enumerable-tokenByIndex}."},"tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Enumerable-tokenOfOwnerByIndex}."},"tokenURI(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-tokenURI}."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"See {IERC721Enumerable-totalSupply}."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-transferFrom}."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}},"stateVariables":{"geneScience":{"details":"The address of the sibling contract that is used to implement the sooper-sekret  genetic combination algorithm."}},"title":"A facet of HauntooCore that manages Hauntoo siring, gestation, and birth.","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Grants approval to another user to sire with one of your Hauntoos."},"autoBirthFee()":{"notice":"The minimum payment required to use breedWithAuto(). This fee goes towards  the gas cost paid by whatever calls giveBirth(), and can be dynamically updated by  the COO role as the gas price changes."},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Breed a Hauntoo you own (as matron) with a sire that you own, or for which you  have previously been given Siring approval. Will either make your cat pregnant, or will  fail entirely. Requires a pre-payment of the fee given out to the first caller of giveBirth()"},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Checks to see if two cats can breed together, including checks for  ownership and siring approvals. Does NOT check that both cats are ready for  breeding (i.e. breedWith could still fail until the cooldowns are finished).  TODO: Shouldn't this check pregnancy and cooldowns?!?"},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"notice":"Have a pregnant Hauntoo give birth!"},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks that a given baby is able to breed (i.e. it is not pregnant or  in the middle of a siring documentation.text: @dev simply a boolean to indicate this is the contract we expect to be

@dev The Pregnant event is fired when two cats successfully breed and the pregnancy
  timer begins for the matron.

@dev The address of the sibling contract that is used to implement the sooper-sekret
  genetic combination algorithm.

@dev Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.
 @param _address An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward.

@dev Checks to see if a given Hauntoo is pregnant and (if so) if the gestation
  period has passed.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct HauntooBase.Hauntoo storage pointer) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Checks whether a hauntoo is currently pregnant.
 @param _hauntooId reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct HauntooBase.Hauntoo storage pointer,uint256,struct HauntooBase.Hauntoo storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Internal check to see if a given sire and matron are a valid mating pair for
  breeding via auction (i.e. skips ownership and siring approval checks).

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct HauntooBase.Hauntoo storage pointer,uint256,struct HauntooBase.Hauntoo storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Internal utility function to initiate breeding, assumes that all breeding
  requirements have been checked.

devdoc.author: Axiom Zen (https://www.axiomzen.co)
devdoc.details: See the HauntooCore contract documentation to understand how the various contract facets are arranged.

Pregnant(address,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: The Pregnant event is fired when two cats successfully breed and the pregnancy  timer begins for the matron.

params._addr: The address that will be able to sire with your Hauntoo. Set to  address(0) to clear all siring approvals for this Hauntoo.
params._sireId: A Hauntoo that you own that _addr will now be able to sire with.

params._matronId: The ID of the Hauntoo acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)
params._sireId: The ID of the Hauntoo acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)

params._matronId: The ID of the proposed matron.
params._sireId: The ID of the proposed sire.

giveBirth(uint256).details: Looks at a given Hauntoo and, if pregnant and if the gestation period has passed,  combines the genes of the two parents to create a new baby. The new Hauntoo is assigned  to the current owner of the matron. Upon successful completion, both the matron and the  new baby will be ready to breed again. Note that anyone can call this function (if they  are willing to pay the gas!), but the new baby always goes to the mother's owner.

params._matronId: A Hauntoo ready to give birth.

returns._0: The Hauntoo ID of the new baby.

isPregnant(uint256).details: Checks whether a hauntoo is currently pregnant.

params._hauntooId: reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it
reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAutoBirthFee(uint256).details: Updates the minimum payment required for calling giveBirthAuto(). Can only  be called by the COO address. (This fee is used to offset the gas cost incurred  by the autobirth daemon).

setGeneScienceAddress(address).details: Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.

params._address: An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

geneScience.details: The address of the sibling contract that is used to implement the sooper-sekret  genetic combination algorithm.

devdoc.title: A facet of HauntooCore that manages Hauntoo siring, gestation, and birth.

approveSiring(address,uint256).notice: Grants approval to another user to sire with one of your Hauntoos.

autoBirthFee().notice: The minimum payment required to use breedWithAuto(). This fee goes towards  the gas cost paid by whatever calls giveBirth(), and can be dynamically updated by  the COO role as the gas price changes.

breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256).notice: Breed a Hauntoo you own (as matron) with a sire that you own, or for which you  have previously been given Siring approval. Will either make your cat pregnant, or will  fail entirely. Requires a pre-payment of the fee given out to the first caller of giveBirth()

canBreedWith(uint256,uint256).notice: Checks to see if two cats can breed together, including checks for  ownership and siring approvals. Does NOT check that both cats are ready for  breeding (i.e. breedWith could still fail until the cooldowns are finished).  TODO: Shouldn't this check pregnancy and cooldowns?!?

giveBirth(uint256).notice: Have a pregnant Hauntoo give birth!

isReadyToBreed(uint256).notice: Checks that a given baby is able to breed (i.e. it is not pregnant or  in the middle of a siring cooldown).
